text: I had bought HP Victus Ryzen 5 series RTX3050 GPU laptop simply for my routine usage for office and other works, but this laptop is beast, doing best in gaming and other heavy task related works.Pros :1.) Price.2.) Premiumness.3.) Performance.4.) Top notch and lag free operation.5.) Gaming in budget.Cons.1.) No cons, except the Heat issues while gaming literally I got my lap baked 😂lol. Use laptop cooler. avoid using the laptop by keeping on bed or mattress it will block the air intake makes the laptop to heat. Read more
